Resolved Question Show me another » What does accounting do in a fast food restaurant? I applied for a job in Del Taco and they ask me if i can do the accounting, I am a junior highschool student, Math is my favorite subject, I always get an A in math class and my computer skill is expert so should i get this job or it is too high for me? 4 years ago Report Abuse by stevepit... Member since: March 11, 2006 Total points: 16,597 (Level 6) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Voters You should be able to handle it. You will probably keep track of receipts and deposits. Maybe do payroll records, etc. I did that kind of work when I was in High School. If you are good with math, it should be easy. 4 years ago Report Abuse 100% 1 Vote 1 person rated this as good
